name: Invaders from Dimension X
description: Invaders From Dimension X! is a solitaire game depicting battles between the crack 124th Galactic Marine Raider Battalion (nicknamed “The Old Reprobates”) of the Unified Space Alliance Defense Force and the invading “pods” of a mysterious alien race, commonly known as the Kay’otz.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Anything in last 5 years Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.6 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Anything in last 5 years Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
